members.joinCircumstances: Officially joined after Arlong Park Arc

keyMoments.title: Surrounded by Nelson's Fleet
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates find themselves completely surrounded by Commodore Nelson's Marine fleet executing the Crane Wing Formation.
keyMoments.significance: The crew faces a major naval threat and must work together to escape the encirclement.

keyMoments.title: Crew Defense Against Bombardment
keyMoments.description: The crew works together to defend the Going Merry from Nelson's naval bombardment, with Luffy deflecting cannonballs.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's coordination and Luffy's commitment to protecting his friends.

ships.description: The crew's first ship, a caravel given to them by Kaya

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

members.joinCircumstances: Introduced as the commander of the branch

keyMoments.title: Executes Crane Wing Formation
keyMoments.description: Marine Branch 8's fleet successfully surrounds the Going Merry using a coordinated naval formation under Nelson's command.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the tactical capabilities of the Marine branch under Nelson's leadership.

keyMoments.title: Nelson Sacrifices His Own Men
keyMoments.description: Nelson orders his entire fleet to open fire on a rowboat containing Eric and three of his own Marines, showing complete disregard for his subordinates' lives.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the corruption and moral bankruptcy of Marine Branch 8 under Nelson's command.

ships.description: A fleet of Marine warships under Nelson's command
